document_data.name: Yovir Glandon
document_data.mainbody: '''Yovir Glandon''' was the high priest of [[Kelemvor]] in [[Phlan]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was also a member of the [[Order of the Silent Shroud]].
document_data.Personality: Yovir was a reserved man, speaking as little as possible. He had no interest in the city's politics but hoped for the best for his people.
